name: Pixel Adventure (F1234811)
description:
Pixel adventure is a a solo platformer game in wich the player has to get to the endpoint dodging different types of obstacles. 

- The controllers are the left and right arrow keys to move horizontally, then the C key and the space bar to jump and double jump, and the last input is the X key used to run.


-  The game is very short it has 10 levels with increasing difficulty.

I hope you enjoy it and good luck!
